item.title: How to Watch the 2025 U.S. Open Live Online Without Cable
item.description: The best and bright tennis players, including Coco Gauff, Aryna Sabalenka, Iga Swiatek, Jannik Sinner, Carlos Alcaraz and others, from all around the world come to New York City for the 145th edition
